name: Legacy (Firedanger)
description:
Legacy is a single player RPG with a medieval theme. Inspired by games like Fable, Stronghold, Sims 4 and Civilization, Legacy puts you in the middle of the kingdom you are building.

You cannot control other NPCs, however you can assign them jobs and give them orders. You play a character you design and if they should die before naming an heir you can select an NPC to play. A year in game is about three hours of play time so you have plenty of time to develop your characters.

You are able to pass on traits through your genealogy and through training. In Legacy you live as the king or queen in your kingdom. Exploration, city building, character development, combat and diplomacy how you play is how you build your legacy.

This game is being made by one person with purchased custom sound effects. Currently the game is in it’s concept stage with very little of the actual gameplay implemented. This free download is of the 0.2.0 version. Any purchased versions unlock future versions for you and helps support the development.

You can visit the Discord server to see more info and updates.
